sentence.Network_en: The company has bankrolled a couple of local movies.

sentence.Network_en: He wrote 54 crime novels, which spawned both movies and television shows.
sentence.Network_cn: 他写了54部侦探小说，很多被改编成了电影和电视剧。

sentence.Network_en: "Performance" is undoubtedly one of the most surreal movies ever made.
sentence.Network_cn: 《迷幻演出》无疑是有史以来最离奇的电影之一。

example.ex: In the first movie Tony Curtis ever made he played a grocery clerk.
example.tran: 托尼·柯蒂斯在其首部电影里，扮演了一个食品杂货店店员。

entry.def: You can talk about the movies when you are talking about seeing a movie in a movie theater.

example.ex: He took her to the movies.

Sentence.sentence: The movies were widely predicted to drive live theater out of the marketplace, but they didn't, because theater turned out to have qualities movies could not reproduce.
The movies were widely predicted to drive live theater out of the marketplace, but they didn't, because theater turned out to have qualities movies could not reproduce.
Equally, TV was supposed to replace movies but, again, did not.
Disaster movies often portray catastrophes that destroy, or at least threaten to destroy earth's entire population.
Hollywood movies usually have an unexpected, dramatic impact on real-life arguments.

sentences.en: For amusement,we go to the movies once a week.
sentences.cn: 我们的娱乐是每周去电影院看一次电影。
